attributes.action: Declare the list of chemtrail poisons being sprayed on us and our cattle.
attributes.additional_details: Declare the list of poisons in the chem-trail spray and how it differs from the poisons being found in people's hair analysis in the USA

rejection.details: This seems to be a request for information - the creator contact the DfT using the contact form https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-transport, this page also has deatils about how to make information requests
